front.title: A Classification and Evaluation of Approaches to Transitional Multicast

abstract.t: A number of different contributions to the IETF make proposals insupport of multicast during the transition from IPv4 to IPv6. Thisdocument provides a taxonomic framework to make it easier to see howthe different proposals relate to each other. It analyzes thecurrent work in progress in the light of this framework and draws anumber of conclusions regarding how this work should move forward inthe BEHAVE and SOFTWIRES Working Groups.
